Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.littleshoot.proxy.impl.NetworkUtils
    This class is no longer used by LittleProxy and may be removed in a future release.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.littleshoot.proxy.impl.NetworkUtils.firstLocalNonLoopbackIpv4Address()
    This method is no longer used by LittleProxy and may be removed in a future release.
    org.littleshoot.proxy.impl.NetworkUtils.getLocalHost()
    This method is no longer used by LittleProxy and may be removed in a future release.
    org.littleshoot.proxy.HttpProxyServerBootstrap.withListenOnAllAddresses(boolean)
    use HttpProxyServerBootstrap.withNetworkInterface(InetSocketAddress) to avoid listening on all local addresses
